transformer 0.2.4

Select and rename a selection of variables

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/dplyr-select-S4methods.R
select.Rd

Select and rename a selection of variables

select_all(.tbl, ...)

select_at(.tbl, ...)

select_if(.tbl, ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
select_all(.tbl, .funs = list(), ...)

# S4 method for DataFrame
select_all(.tbl, .funs = list(), ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
select_at(.tbl, .vars, .funs = list(), ...)

# S4 method for DataFrame
select_at(.tbl, .vars, .funs = list(), ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
select_if(.tbl, .predicate, .funs = list(), ...)

# S4 method for DataFrame
select_if(.tbl, .predicate, .funs = list(), ...)

Arguments

.tbl

Object.
...

Additional argument.
.funs

function. Refer to dplyr documentation for details.
.vars

character. Column names.
.predicate

function. Refer to dplyr documentation for details.

Value

Modified object.

Note

Updated 2019-08-15.

data.frame methods

Since we are defining S4 methods in this package, we are providing passthrough support to dplyr for data.frame class objects. Our generic methods pass through to dplyr select functions, which are optimized for tbl_df class.

Refer to help(topic = "select_all", package = "dplyr") for details.

Examples

data(mtcars, package = "datasets")

## DataFrame ====
x <- as(mtcars, "DataFrame")
select_all(x, .funs = toupper)
#> DataFrame with 32 rows and 11 columns
#>                         MPG       CYL      DISP        HP      DRAT        WT
#>                   <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric>
#> Mazda RX4                21         6       160       110       3.9      2.62
#> Mazda RX4 Wag            21         6       160       110       3.9     2.875
#> Datsun 710             22.8         4       108        93      3.85      2.32
#> Hornet 4 Drive         21.4         6       258       110      3.08     3.215
#> Hornet Sportabout      18.7         8       360       175      3.15      3.44
#> ...                     ...       ...       ...       ...       ...       ...
#> Lotus Europa           30.4         4      95.1       113      3.77     1.513
#> Ford Pantera L         15.8         8       351       264      4.22      3.17
#> Ferrari Dino           19.7         6       145       175      3.62      2.77
#> Maserati Bora            15         8       301       335      3.54      3.57
#> Volvo 142E             21.4         4       121       109      4.11      2.78
#>                        QSEC        VS        AM      GEAR      CARB
#>                   <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric>
#> Mazda RX4             16.46         0         1         4         4
#> Mazda RX4 Wag         17.02         0         1         4         4
#> Datsun 710            18.61         1         1         4         1
#> Hornet 4 Drive        19.44         1         0         3         1
#> Hornet Sportabout     17.02         0         0         3         2
#> ...                     ...       ...       ...       ...       ...
#> Lotus Europa           16.9         1         1         5         2
#> Ford Pantera L         14.5         0         1         5         4
#> Ferrari Dino           15.5         0         1         5         6
#> Maserati Bora          14.6         0         1         5         8
#> Volvo 142E             18.6         1         1         4         2
select_at(x, .vars = c("mpg", "cyl"))
#> DataFrame with 32 rows and 2 columns
#>                         mpg       cyl
#>                   <numeric> <numeric>
#> Mazda RX4                21         6
#> Mazda RX4 Wag            21         6
#> Datsun 710             22.8         4
#> Hornet 4 Drive         21.4         6
#> Hornet Sportabout      18.7         8
#> ...                     ...       ...
#> Lotus Europa           30.4         4
#> Ford Pantera L         15.8         8
#> Ferrari Dino           19.7         6
#> Maserati Bora            15         8
#> Volvo 142E             21.4         4
select_if(x, .predicate = is.double)
#> DataFrame with 32 rows and 11 columns
#>                         mpg       cyl      disp        hp      drat        wt
#>                   <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric>
#> Mazda RX4                21         6       160       110       3.9      2.62
#> Mazda RX4 Wag            21         6       160       110       3.9     2.875
#> Datsun 710             22.8         4       108        93      3.85      2.32
#> Hornet 4 Drive         21.4         6       258       110      3.08     3.215
#> Hornet Sportabout      18.7         8       360       175      3.15      3.44
#> ...                     ...       ...       ...       ...       ...       ...
#> Lotus Europa           30.4         4      95.1       113      3.77     1.513
#> Ford Pantera L         15.8         8       351       264      4.22      3.17
#> Ferrari Dino           19.7         6       145       175      3.62      2.77
#> Maserati Bora            15         8       301       335      3.54      3.57
#> Volvo 142E             21.4         4       121       109      4.11      2.78
#>                        qsec        vs        am      gear      carb
#>                   <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric>
#> Mazda RX4             16.46         0         1         4         4
#> Mazda RX4 Wag         17.02         0         1         4         4
#> Datsun 710            18.61         1         1         4         1
#> Hornet 4 Drive        19.44         1         0         3         1
#> Hornet Sportabout     17.02         0         0         3         2
#> ...                     ...       ...       ...       ...       ...
#> Lotus Europa           16.9         1         1         5         2
#> Ford Pantera L         14.5         0         1         5         4
#> Ferrari Dino           15.5         0         1         5         6
#> Maserati Bora          14.6         0         1         5         8
#> Volvo 142E             18.6         1         1         4         2
